import React from "react"; import { Nav, Container, Button, Row, Col, Card, CardGroup, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap"; import Fade from "react-reveal"; import image1 from "../images/image1.jpeg"; import divider from "../images/divider1.png"; import beginner from "../images/beginner.jpeg"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import Navigation from "../components/Navigation"; import "../styles/index.css"; const Join = () => ( <> {/* General notes about this page: Not really sure about the design, I kinda just put stuff on the page. It's okay but it also feels like something is missing. I can't tell if it's a content issue or a space issue. I like the cards here, though, as it stylistically matches the officers page and provides an easy way to update the site in the future. Additionally, it would be really cool to have these pull info from an event database, which would also signicantly reduce the amount of work in updating the page. */}

EN GARDE.

READY. FENCE.




UPCOMING EVENTS


PFC Call Out Join us at our club call out! We'll be answering questions, introducing ourselves, and having some our members demonstrate fencing bouts! Tuesday, August 31st @ 2pm
Location: TBD Be-Involved Fair Come see us at the Be-Involved fair! We will have a booth with some fencing equipment on display. We'll also be happy to answer any questions! August 21st 12-5pm
Location: Black and Gold Fields First Official Fall 2021 Fencing Practice This is a longer card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer. August 29th @ 2pm


OPPORTUNITIES FOR BEGINNERS


Beginner's Class Learn to fence! Over a month, we will teach you how to Af sriracha etsy gochujang swag hot chicken bicycle rights yuccie hella slow-carb irony locavore fixie.


Next Class: August 29th
@ The Corec, 4pm


); export default Join;
